hero.title: We connect the right workers with the right employers.
hero.subtitle: Find the perfect match for your business needs or career goals with our comprehensive platform.

cardhome1.title: Recruitment
cardhome1.description: We provide full-cycle recruiting & HR services that are tailored to the business needs.

cardhome2.title: HR-consulting
cardhome2.description: We help companies create a well-known brand that will stand out on the market and boost hiring metrics.

cardhome3.title: Outstaffing
cardhome3.description: We provide outstaffing for fast-growing companies, help to grow companies' teams and increase their productivity.

homepartner.partnerdesc: We specialize in recruiting and selecting foreign workers from various regions, including {asia}, {gulf}, {americas}, and {africa}. Operating from our central offices in {dubai}, we place workers in countries such as the {uk}, {croatia}, {malta}, {bulgaria}, {poland}, {romania}, and other {european} nations.
